slip.advice: Don't go to the bar! Have one at home.
Play Russian roulette to get rid of hiccups quickly.
Sing to your plants in an indian accent to make them grow taller.
Ace any job interview by carrying a rubber duck in your pocket.
People who eat pizza for breakfast are destined to live to 100.
Giving a woman a piece of cheese may gain her interest.
To improve your posture, pretend that you are shooting lasers out of your nipples and trying to shoot people in the head.
Unmarried women cannot parachute on Sundays
If you teach a man to fish, you feed him for one day. If you feed him to the fishes then he’ll never be hungry again.
Trust dogs. They always know who to stay away from.
Eat whatever you want, and if someone calls you fat, eat them too.
If you can't fight the fear, do it scared.
If you hear weird noises in the night, simply make weirder noises to assert dominance.
It’s only embarrassing if you’re embarrassed.
If you wait until the last minute to do it, it only takes a minute to do.
Boost your IQ by smelling farts.
Do not think of yourself as an ugly person. Think of yourself as facially challenged.
Don't give excuses unless they ask for it.
